tasks.label: 0 CLEAN SOURCE
tasks.command: rm -rf annotated partitioned divvied refactored jsons verifier *working *.json;

tasks.label: 1 ANNOTATE
tasks.command: mkdir annotated; cp -R plain/* annotated; echo Prepared sources for CLE annotation by developer under ./annotated; echo Move to Conflict Analysis when done annotating

tasks.label: 9b AUTOGEN GEDL, RPCs, IDL, Codecs
tasks.command: source .make/closure_env.sh && mkdir -p partitioned && cp -r $CLOSURE_PYTHON/gedl/heuristics/ ./partitioned && make -f .make/gedl.make gedl && make -f .make/gedl.make rautogen && make -f .make/gedl.make rpc

tasks.label: 9c VERIFY
tasks.command: source .make/closure_env.sh; make -f .make/verifier.make verify; make -f .make/verifier.make analyze; make -f .make/ect.make ect

tasks.label: 9d BUILD
tasks.command: source .make/closure_env.sh && for e in ${ENCLAVES}; do make -C partitioned/${IPCMODE}/$e -f ../../../.make/${PROG}.make; done

tasks.label: 4 BUILD PLAIN
tasks.command: source .make/closure_env.sh; cd plain; make -f plain.make clean; make -f plain.make;
